Articles.Content:
**MiG-25 Foxbat**

Designer: Zekes

Status:

**COMPLETED**

Cost:

**$74,392.00** 

**A replica of the Soviet Cold-War era Mach 3 Interceptor. Includes Drop Tanks and realistic looks.**

**Max Speed is 1150m/s**

**Max Altitude is 23,000m level flight**

**Press "4" for flaps toggle, "G" for gear.**

***Download:***  [**https://www./?51bk4i9390ve087**](https://www./?51bk4i9390ve087)

![q0ZO1FP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/q0ZO1FP.jpg)

![dbrxb2Y.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/dbrxb2Y.jpg)

![6bn8FLw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6bn8FLw.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T00:25:17Z" title="05/02/2015 12:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by zekes**

You're beating the crowds by posting this before the soviet pack? I hope it will still be in the pack.

"You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to zekes again." Oh well, I'll rep you later.

> 
> You're beating the crowds by posting this before the soviet pack? I hope it will still be in the pack.
> "You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to zekes again." Oh well, I'll rep you later.

Haha, thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I realized the pack's going to take a lot longer now that it's several people's creations, I want to do it right, so I'm releasing this one because i love it very much :3
We're having fun with aircraft for now!
The MiG-35 is coming soon - it's the upgrade of the MiG-25 and in every way better.
